title: [Minecraft.net|DEEP DIVES] MC社区的艺术画展

MINECRAFT COMMUNITY ART GALLERYMC社区的艺术画展


A charming collection of community creations!这里有着一套令人着迷的社区艺术作品集！
It’s time for a brand new community spotlight! During our first foray into the world of fan art, we were delighted to learn about the abundance of talent just waiting for us within the Minecraft community. We’ve started off this collection with ditto’s, beautiful render of Alex balancing on a lily pad, but we have much more to share. Let’s take a look at the latest creations created by our community members. 现在让我把焦点转向这个全新的MC社区！在我们第一次向着艺术方向发展时，我们欣喜地发现在MC社区里有很多人才。今天我们从展示Alex的"睡莲平衡图"开始，但是接下来还有很多作品要和你分享，一起来看看社区成员们的最新作品吧！

Ready to submit your art? Send it to FeatureMe@minecraft.net, keep your fingers crossed, and it might get featured! We can’t wait to share what everyone’s making next.准备好上传你的艺术作品了吗？那就把它发送到邮箱  FeatureMe@minecraft.net ，然后你就可以祈祷它成为社区特色了！我也已经迫不及待地想要和大家分享之后的事情了。


原文作者：Nova Barlow发布时间：2018/4/10原文地址：https://www.minecraft.net/zh-hans/article/minecraft-community-art-gallery翻译作者：Srar
